ing: 1 hard-boiled egg, forced through a coarse sieve
des: "My mother and I always judge a seafood restaurant by their tartar sauce. Well, here's one that will make any fried halibut jump for joy!  It's worth the extra ingredients and fuss."
ins: Stir together the mayonnaise, pickles, egg, shallot, capers, tarragon, mustard, parsley, and lemon juice in a bowl. Refrigerate 4 to 8 hours before serving.
